remarks: Summation by parts.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 13-Apr-2016.)
statement:
fsumparts.b $e |- ( k = j -> ( A = B /\ V = W ) ) $.
fsumparts.c $e |- ( k = ( j + 1 ) -> ( A = C /\ V = X ) ) $.
fsumparts.d $e |- ( k = M -> ( A = D /\ V = Y ) ) $.
fsumparts.e $e |- ( k = N -> ( A = E /\ V = Z ) ) $.
fsumparts.1 $e |- ( ph -> N e. ( ZZ>= ` M ) ) $.
fsumparts.2 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. ( M ... N ) ) -> A e. CC ) $.
fsumparts.3 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. ( M ... N ) ) -> V e. CC ) $.
fsumparts $p |- ( ph -> sum_ j e. ( M ..^ N ) ( B x. ( X - W ) ) = ( ( ( E x. Z ) - ( D x. Y ) ) - sum_ j e. ( M ..^ N ) ( ( C - B ) x. X ) ) ) $.
$d A j $.
$d B k $.
$d C k $.
$d D k $.
$d E k $.
$d M j k $.
$d N j k $.
$d V j $.
$d W k $.
$d X k $.
$d Y k $.
$d Z k $.
$d j k ph $.
